articles.description: Starlink will provide inflight Wi-Fi service for the charter airline JSX.
articles.content:
SpaceX just secured its first deal to provide inflight internet service on airplanes using its Starlink constellation of broadband satellites.
The service will be available later this year to custom… [+3530 chars]
